::Battera::

She was almost to the hatch. She turned her head back to see how far 
behind her WindRider was.  She turned her head just in time to see a 
beam in front of her and hit it head on. "OOhhfff." She falls to the 
ground in a lump of tangled wings and fur. "ohhh, that hurt." in a 
rough voice. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> "Whoa!!" he exclaimed as Battera sped past him. He
> knew that he couldnt match her speed, but he wasnt one
> to give up the chase. He continued after her, laughing
> the whole way.
